name: BEST WESTERN PLUS Time Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009
reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel for 4 nights when we were in Stockholm. Great hotel, very clean and modern, large walk in shower and a great breakfast. Within walking distance of buses and underground.
reviews.title: GREAT HOTEL EVEN GREATER CITY

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled on business
reviews.text: The Best Western Time is located in a fairly quiet area north of the centre and the station. My partner and I stayed for four nights and the rate was very reasonable. On arrival, the staff seemed friendly enough and the lift is is equipped with a key card reader - an added secruity feature you don't always see. The room is small, but clean and the bed was quite comfortable as well. We both liked the underfloor heating in the bathroom/wetroom, nice touch.
reviews.title: Good...but don't expect the internet to work

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The negatives really centre around the internet. They insist wireless is available in the rooms but on the 7th floor where our room was the signal was weak to non-existent. When it did work, which it never really did (constant signal loss) it was painfully slow - similar to a dial-up modem. We both complained to the desk repeatedly but we got the impression the problem was not easily remedied - the staff would instruct someone to turn the router off/on which made no difference to the wireless in our room.
reviews.title: Wonderful!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The wireless issue was raised by another reviewer previously - I can say the situation as of June 27, 2009 has not improved.
reviews.title: Good value in a pleasant city

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: So if you don't plan to use the internet in your room, I have no problem recommending Best Western Time. But if you're going on business and need a room with regular, reliable internet access I'd suggest staying elsewhere.
reviews.title: Great value within walking distance if city centre

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location of this hotel is great.
reviews.title: Good hotel, but plain rooms and its rather costly...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We didn’t use the metro and as we found the walk up to the hotel to be around 20 minutes from the city centre. The bus takes 5 minutes and is easy to use and is always on time. Its well positioned with ample restaurants and shops around, as well as great links to the other attractions.
reviews.title: CLEAN AND TIDY, BUT.....

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The service is great, the place is wonderfully clean.
reviews.title: Great Hotel.. with really good breakfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled on business
reviews.text: The breakfast is brilliant and hits the spot.
reviews.title: GREAT choice for this wonderful city!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff are helpful, knowledgeable and friendly.
reviews.title: GREAT!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: lovely hotel- modern , out of the main town, but on bus route 2 so easy to get anywhere, breakfast excellent, rooms good, great value for money ( 2690 swedish crowns for 3 nights on the best western website- unbeatable), friendly staff, wifi in room, internet in foyer, staff will print off emails for you, we left early the last day and they put up a breakfast box for us. I could not fault except for the back room overlooking a basketball site so daily pounding of the basketball.
reviews.title: great value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Good hotel. Rooms were small but very clean. Good, friendly staff and good breakfast.
reviews.title: A good average hotel

likes.disliked: — rooms were small and showers were not enclosed thus causing a lot of splashing on the floor

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If anything, I found the place a bit too neutral, I would have preferred something a bit more quirky but that is my personal taste.
reviews.title: Modern and clean

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I also found the lack of things one expects in a 4 star hotel a bit annoying: no shower caps, no tissues etc.
reviews.title: Good stay in nice hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009
reviews.text: Stockholm is a lovely city apart from the weather and the hotel is situated in a quiet, residential area not too far from the centre. Plenty of activities and things to see, not to mention shopping.
reviews.title: Very nice hotel.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I recently stayed at Best Western Time. It is a decent hotel placed in a quiet neighbourhood, which however isn't far from Odenplan where you find subway, restaurants, shops etc.
reviews.title: Good and bad, mostly good.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled on business
reviews.text: We got a room at the seventh floor overlooking a basketball court and a few other surrounding buildings. The room itself was equipped with a flatscreen 32" tv, a big comfy bed and free wireless internet, which worked allright.
reviews.title: Terrible service - expensive and bad experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The main problem with the room for us was the a/c which atleast we couldn't figure out how to turn off. It sounded like a small power plant and we had trouble sleeping because of it. We probably could have contacted front desk, but we discovered it pretty late at night. It would also be nice if there was a fridge in the room, and it's a bit of a shame that there's no real restaurant in the hotel.
reviews.title: A perfect stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The best thing with the hotel in my opinion is the relax-room with a big sauna that you can use for free, and that you have for yourself. Breakfast was allright but nothing special.
reviews.title: Excellent value, would stay there again if I ever return to Stockholm

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled with friends
reviews.text: I'd say the hotel deserves a four, not a strong four, but still a four. It has good rooms, very nice staff and it's good value.
reviews.title: Good value for money

description: BEST WESTERN PLUS Time Hotel is a 4-star modern hotel situated in Stockholm City. As our guest you'll experience something unique - a hotel built in 2007 with a friendly and relaxing atmosphere. Here you will find a mixture of modern and classical design and personal service, which you will be longing to return to. So whether you are here on business or on vacation we strive to do the utmost to make your stay the best possible. A warm welcome awaits you at BEST WESTERN PLUS Time Hotel, giving a new meaning to comfort and style!
